question: What is the name of the new private-public partnership initiative available on Aarogaya Setu app, that will offer free online Covid-19-related consultation?
explanation:
A new private-public partnership initiative called Aarogya Setu Mitr will be available on the Aarogaya Setu app and it will offer free online Covid-19-related consultation. It is also claimed that Aarogya Setu Mitr is a separate site and could not use individual data from Aarogya Setu app.
It provides free tele-consultation for people with Covid-19 symptoms and services such as home collection of samples and medicine delivery, at market rates. Three private companies from the Tata Group, Tech Mahindra and a collaboration named Swasth, provide the services.
